item.title: This Heart-Wrenching Ballad Will Have You Singing Along to 'I'll Come Back to You'!
item.description: Introduction Have you ever heard a song that made you feel so deeply that you just had to sing along? That’s exactly what happened when we heard “I’ll Come Back to You,” a heart-wrenching ballad written and performed by singer-songwriter, Sarah McLachlan What is the Song “I’ll Come Back to You” About? The song is about a woman who is struggling with the loss of her lover. She is filled with grief and longing, yet she finds solace in the thought that she will one day be reunited with him.
